_sText:
ENG : I make this map for fun. This is one of my first :). It's a new style of game, a bomberman like without the bombs ^^.
We begin with a knife and after time, we find weapons behind crates. Like a deagle, m249, awp. Three right click hit with knife break a crate. One shot with the awp and two with the deagle. For find the deagle, go to your right or left at each respawn and break the crate.

Sorry for my very very bad english :).
